full_summary:
### Standing Offer for Editing Services

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-279-3333239
* **Amendment Number**: 11
* **Solicitation Number**: 24-246644
* **Publication Date**: May 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 17, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Contract Requirements

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is for Editing services, with a requirement of up to 15 French editors and 15 English editors. The initial contract duration is expected to be three years, with two optional one-year extensions.

#### Background

Due to the nature of its work and mandate, the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development requires document editing and publication services on an as-needed basis. Communication products submitted on behalf of Ministers may be urgent, necessitating that the department maintain a team of editors who are part of a standing offer and are available on a rotating basis.

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0G4
* **Contact**: Martine Bray, (343) 572-6812, martine.bray@international.gc.ca

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available for download from the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website: [link to Buy and Sell](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others.

#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

This contract is for services to be delivered nationally, specifically within the National Capital Region. 

Note: I made significant edits to the text to ensure it flows well, is grammatically correct, and concise. I also formatted the output in markdown format as per your request.

Responsibilities/expectations
-----------------------------

* Keep all documentation up-to-date and accurate
* Maintain a professional tone and style in all communications
* Be knowledgeable of and follow the style guide and editorial guidelines for the documents I write/edit
* Continuously improve the quality of my work based on feedback
